alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:17PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Thunderstorms North of Fairbanks... A line of thunderstorms is occuring from Chena Hot Springs northwest over near Mile 40 Steese Highway, and then continuing northwest to Stevens Village. Radar indicates small hail, brief heavy rain and winds gusting to 25 mph are occuring with the thunderstorms. This line is expected to extend northwest towards the Finger Mountain area of the Dalton Highway in the next hour and towards Bettles later this evening. The line thunderstorms will remain north of Fairbanks and diminish later this evening, but there is a slight chance a thunderstorm could form in the Fairbanks area this evening.

area.areaDesc: Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands
